Package repast.simphony.visualization.visualization2D.style

Interface ValueLayerStyle

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ValueLayerStyle3D
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultValueLayerStyle, DefaultValueLayerStyle3D, EditedValueLayerStyle2D, EditedValueLayerStyle3D
    public interface ValueLayerStyle
    Deprecated.
    replaced by ogl 2D
    Interface for classes that implement visualization styles for ValueLayers.
    Author:
    Nick Collier, Eric Tatara
    See Also:
    ValueLayer

      • getCellSize

        float getCellSize()
        Deprecated.
        Gets the size of one size of the cell value layer cell. The units are those appropriate to the display -- 2D or 3D.
        Returns:
        the width of the cell.
